description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Your ship is trapped in orbit around a black hole. Adjust your orbit and fire torpedoes to defend yourself and your mothership against destruction from approaching asteroids.   You can't escape... but how long can you survive?
description.short: Your ship is trapped in orbit around a black hole. Adjust your orbit and fire torpedoes to defend yourself and your mothership against destruction from approaching asteroids.   You can't escape... but how long can you survive?
